channel.title: An approach to Whonix upgrade
channel.description: Hello. Can I only upgrade Whonix Gateway VM to version 16 but leave the old Whonix Workstation? As far as I heard, Gateway is a key VM in Whonix project so it is important to keep Gateway up-to-date but as for Workstation, you can use any OS you like with Gateway so an upgrade for Workstation VM is not so important as upgrading Gateway.

item.title: An approach to Whonix upgrade
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix 15 End of Security Support and Deprecation Notice - All users should move to Whonix 16!

Read full topic

item.title: An approach to Whonix upgrade
item.dc:creator: anonymousman
item.description:
Hello. Can I only upgrade Whonix Gateway VM to version 16 but leave the old Whonix Workstation? As far as I heard, Gateway is a key VM in Whonix project so it is important to keep Gateway up-to-date but as for Workstation, you can use any OS you like with Gateway so an upgrade for Workstation VM is not so important as upgrading Gateway.

Read full topic
